item.title: Trump should aim for zero tariffs. It could usher in a golden age for Americans.
item.description: How “tariff zero” would expand opportunities for American exporters and help U.S. companies sell to the world.

item.title: How trade wars and tariffs could put stock dividends on the chopping block
item.description: Companies will slash dividend payouts to make up for lost revenue.

item.title: Shelter from inflation? CPI not showing much sign of it lately.
item.description: Rents and home prices aren’t going up like crazy anymore, but they are still one of the biggest sources of U.S. inflation.

item.title: Under Armour’s stock drops as company skips annual guidance due to uncertainty around trade and the economy
item.description: Sports apparel giant expects a slight first-quarter profit, while Wall Street was expecting a breakeven quarter

item.title: Social Security’s COLA could be lowest since 2021, pressuring seniors’ budgets
item.description: The 2026 Social Security cost-of-living-adjustment is projected to be 2.4%.
